entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy and ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of thunderstorms early this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:32 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 1:32 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:32 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
